page.title: 18Tourism in Lacock
page.content: Every day during the summer months the tourists flock to visit Lacock. People come from nearby and from far across the world and the general opinion of the village is favourable. Everyone is delighted to see such an example of old England. The Americans are particularly enthusiastic visitors and love the old timbered buildings and the history. Although many make their own way to the area, the great majority of the tourists arrive on a coach trip from{Bath}as it is included in most of the sightseeing tours.
